Plot: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.
Writer: Hayao Miyazaki (screenplay), Aoi Hiiragi (comic), Cindy Davis Hewitt (screenplay: English version), Donald H. Hewitt (screenplay: English version)
Title: Whisper of the Heart
Actors: Yoko Honna, Issey Takahashi, Takashi Tachibana, Shigeru Muroi
